title: THE HEART OF A CHAMPION
itunes:title: THE HEART OF A CHAMPION
itunes:subtitle: Motiversity
description:
Heart of a CHAMPION! Champions don't appear overnight. Being a champion takes work, grit and an understanding that if you're trying to be better than your opponent then you need to work a little harder than them every single day. This is a powerful new motivational speech and our latest release with Coach Pain (https://bit.ly/CoachPainMotiversity). Music by Really Slow Motion (https://bit.ly/RSMMusic).

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
